p: Comparing the results of the first follow-up (cycle 1) demonstrated that the total scores of PMS, its 14 symptoms, and also its interference with various activities (according to PSST) in the EA group have decreased to 6.2, 4.4 and 1.3, respectively. Moreover, these values have decreased to 11.6, 8.5, and 2.8, respectively (TableÂ 3) in the second follow-up (cycle 2) in the EA group.
